span.strong: School closed for in person classes through Friday, May 22nd

span.p: Sign up on Remind.com @darrouzett and then search for a class by your teacher's name.

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

p.span: Snack Pak 4 Kids is on a mission to end weekend hunger for children living in the Texas Panhandle by providing a backpack filled with kid-friendly snacks each Friday of the school year.

li.span: 7,000 children receive a Snack Pak every weekend
67% of teachers saw improvement in academic performance
94% of teachers feel Snack Pak is a beneficial program
27.1% of the children in TExas are food insecure.

p.span: Snack Pak 4 Kids uses 100% of all donated monies from our area to buy food for Darrouzett ISD students.

br.span: Our Snack Paks are put together by volunteers in Canadian, TX and are then distributed to DISD food insecure students on Friday afternoons.

p.span: Monetary donations can be sent to either directly to or through the school to the Darrouzett Village Improvement Program. Please indicate on your check that you would like to support DISD Sack Pak 4 Kids. Any donation amount is needed but the cost of eeding an elementary student is $150/yr or $12.50/mo for the entire school year. To learn more about Snack Pak 4 kids, please contact Troy Humphrey at 806-624-2221.
